snippet.title: Pet’n’Run Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
You can wishlist the game here https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/8771886126228745/

Pet’n’Run is a Mixed Reality game where you take control of animals and pet your way through challenging levels.

The more you pet your animal, the faster it runs. Sprint, scuttle, or squeal your way through chaotic environments packed with obstacles, platforms, puzzles, jumps, and hidden shortcuts.

Create your own levels, race against friends or other players in thrilling matches, with more quirky animal racers joining the fun soon.
